content: this is what it says from AR 37-49 Budgeting Funnding, and Reimbursement for Base Operations Support of Army Activiites. "Reimbursement to host major range and test facility base installations for use of ranges and test facilities only will be in accordance with AR 37-110. All other tenants/satellites will reimburse in accordance with this regulation." i have searched all over and alot of other AR's refer to it

content: IF you are looking for Control of TDY Travel and Per Diem Costs, then it is NGR 37-110, which is a National Guard Publication. content: Numbers and anyone else in the National Guard, Army Reserves, or Active Duty components of the US Army, If you need to look up a form... go to your unit's library (or whatever the location that houses the mandatory TDA required official publications) and find DA PAM 25-30. It is the "Consolidated Index of Army Publications and Forms." Everything is in there.... And Numbers... the AR you are looking for is obsolete... which is why you cannot find it. Now, if you have the time, submit a change request for updating AR 37-49. DA PAM 25-30
reply: Numbers and anyone else in the National Guard, Army Reserves, or Active Duty components of the US Army, If you need to look up a form... go to your unit's library (or whatever the location that houses the mandatory TDA required official publications) and find DA PAM 25-30. It is the "Consolidated Index of Army Publications and Forms." Everything is in there.... And Numbers... the AR you are looking for is obsolete... which is why you cannot find it. Now, if you have the time, submit a change request for updating AR 37-49. DA PAM 25-30
